biotools.summary: Automated Pipeline for Infants Continuous EEG (APICE) is a fully automated, flexible, and modular. Artifacts are detected using multiple algorithms and adaptive thresholds, making it suitable to different age groups and testing procedures without redefining parameters

bioschemas.name: APICE
